alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Bear Lake Valley; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Raft River Region; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued November 27 at 11:37AM MST until November 30 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...An extended period of stagnant air, with light winds and little vertical mixing, is expected. * WHERE...The entire Snake River plain, including the Arco-Mud Lake region, the Wood River foothills, the Big and Little Lost River Valleys, the Bear Lake Valley, and Teton Valley. This includes Idaho National Laboratory, Fort Hall, Craters of the Moon, and the cities and towns of American Falls, Pocatello, Blackfoot, Shelley, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Rockland, Montepelier, Ashton, Driggs, Howe, Mackay, Hailey and Bellevue. * WHEN...Until noon MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface. Should air quality deteriorate to health-impacting levels, an Air Quality Advisory will be issued.
info.instruction: If possible, reduce or eliminate activities that contribute to air pollution, such as outdoor burning, and the use of residential wood burning devices. Reduce vehicle trips and vehicle idling as much as possible. Check with local agencies for possible restrictions in your area.
